bioAsHtml: Sara Harkousse is a Technical Lead, Front-End Web Developer at Dassault Systèmes for the ENOVIA brand , Speaker at Tech Conferences like Devoxx Morocco, DevFest Nantes, BlendWebMix, Js Kongress , United Dev Conf, jFokus …, 3DS Advocate at “Elles Bougent” and one of “Duchess France” leaders. She received an engineering degree in electronics and computer science from INSA Rennes in France. Diversity in tech fields is one of her battles, hence she do not hesitate to organize meetups in order to spread the word about the newest technologies or simply share her experience as a developer.

acceptedTalks.title: Lighthouse: mesurer et améliorer votre performance web
Web Components: It's all rainbows and unicorns! Is it?

bio:
Sara Harkousse is a Technical Lead, Front-End Web Developer at Dassault Systèmes for the ENOVIA brand , Speaker at Tech Conferences like Devoxx Morocco, DevFest Nantes, BlendWebMix, Js Kongress , United Dev Conf, jFokus …, 3DS Advocate at “Elles Bougent” and  one of “Duchess France” leaders. She received an engineering degree in electronics and computer science from INSA Rennes in France. 
Diversity in tech fields is one of her battles, hence she do not hesitate to organize meetups in order to spread the word about the newest technologies or simply share her experience as a developer.
